entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
